author: Simon Difford
description: With a whole egg, a shot of tequila, Jägermeister and Chartreuse, this is both a Death Flip and perhaps your last meal, for a while at least. Challenging herbal and bitter complexity yet with endearing sweet creaminess.
name: Death Flip
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (2 sugar to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
